zh.Base.index.021452-3: 产品：以产品维度告警，某产品下的多个设备异常仅发送一条告警。
zh.Base.index.021452-4: 设备：以设备维度告警，任何设备异常即发送一条告警。
zh.Base.index.021452-5: 组织：以组织维度告警，某组织下的多个设备异常仅发送一条告警。
zh.Base.index.021452-6: 其他：以场景联动维度告警，某场景下的多个设备异常仅发送一条告警。
zh.Base.index.021452-14: 操作成功,请配置关联的场景联动

en.Base.index.021452-3: Product: Alarm based on product dimension, with only one alarm sent for multiple abnormal devices under a certain product.
en.Base.index.021452-4: Equipment: Alarm based on device dimension, and send an alarm for any abnormal device.
en.Base.index.021452-5: Organization: Alarm based on organizational dimensions, with multiple devices under a certain organization sending only one alarm for abnormalities.
en.Base.index.021452-6: Other: Alarm based on scene linkage dimension, where multiple devices in a certain scene are abnormal and only one alarm is sent.
en.Base.index.021452-13: Up to 200 characters can be entered
en.Base.index.021452-14: Operation successful, please configure the associated scene linkage
